name: Pong With A Pun
description:
Hi, this is Pong With A Pun, the classic pong game with a twist. The basic mechanic, i.e. the scoreboard is missing. Also, your paddles will act as your healthbar which you have to protect from the ball. The last man standing wins the game!

P.S : Controls are given on the menu screen.

Have Fun! :)
